properties.name: Rogluf
properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 39°C.

properties.name: Qermiluiaattu Hot Springs
properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 33°C.

properties.name: Fallismar Hot Springs
properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 45°C.

properties.name: Morvika — copper mining town
properties.legend: Morvika is a mining town of 1864 people just nearby the copper mine.

properties.name: The Hungry Tavern
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious pan-fried beef with yellow juice is served here.

properties.name: Sulluittuut Waterfall
properties.legend: A river drops down from a great height forming a wonderous waterfall.

properties.name: Tussoq Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Akron Deities.

properties.name: Stamsmyra Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Ilat Druidism.

properties.name: Hafjorme Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Ilat Druidism.

properties.name: Qatuut Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Akron Deities.

properties.name: Kordaldu Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Ilat Druidism.

properties.name: Hofnavo Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Ilat Druidism.

properties.name: Kaakala Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Ilat Faith.

properties.name: Bredalhid Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Akron Deities.

properties.name: Ruined Town
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient town. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Sengateyri Cavern
properties.legend: The Sengateyri Cavern. Locals claim that it is completely flooded.

properties.name: Yathkelach Cave
properties.legend: The Yathkelach Cave. Locals claim that it is a good spot to hid treasure.

properties.name: Tadrayalim Cave
properties.legend: The Tadrayalim Cave. Locals claim that it is totally empty.

properties.name: Cosmic Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured cosmic rift in this area is causing an emmissary to step through with an all-powerful relic.
